title: Zoopla Property Scraper Input
description: Extract UK property listings from Zoopla. Configure search by location, property type, price range, and bedrooms. The scraper uses efficient data extraction with pagination support.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Zoopla search URL to start scraping from. If provided, this overrides location and filter settings.

location.title: Location
location.description: UK location to search for properties (e.g., 'London', 'Manchester', 'Birmingham')

listingType.title: Listing Type
listingType.description: Type of property listing to search

propertyType.title: Property Type
propertyType.description: Type of property to search for

radius.title: Search Radius (miles)
radius.description: Search radius from location in miles

includeDetails.title: Scrape Property Details
includeDetails.description: If enabled, scraper visits each property detail page to extract full information including description, images, and features

resultsWanted.title: Maximum Results
resultsWanted.description: Maximum number of properties to scrape (leave empty for all available)

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to process

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings to avoid blocking. Residential proxies recommended for Zoopla.
